title: Gianni Savio, Italy’s Passionate Talent-Hunter, Dies at 76
content:
The ever-optimistic Savio helped nurture and extend pro careers since the 1980s, and gave Egan Bernal his first pro contract.

Read the full article at Gianni Savio, Italy’s Passionate Talent-Hunter, Dies at 76 on Velo.
